args: if [ "$CLAUDE_CODE_REMOTE" = "true" ]; then echo '[Claude Config] Deploying slash commands and methodologies for Web...'; mkdir -p ~/.claude/commands ~/.claude/methodologies; cp -v .claude/commands/*.md ~/.claude/commands/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No project commands to deploy'; cp -rv .claude/methodologies/*.md ~/.claude/methodologies/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No methodologies to deploy'; echo '[Claude Config] Deployment complete. Commands available: /code, /review, /lead, /research, /product, /devops'; fi
sessionStartHooks.description: Deploy Claude Code configurations for Web environment

comment: This SessionStart hook deploys slash commands and methodologies to ~/.claude/ on Claude Code Web. Only runs on Web (checks CLAUDE_CODE_REMOTE). Commands must be in .claude/commands/ in your repo.
